name: En2ArTrans
short_description:
This project in intended to be under the License of Waqf, to help Arabic Guys to Translate English books to Arabic.

This Translator is designed to learn words from you ... so, it will grow with you :)

I know everything called software is always expensive and less quality than expected especially in Arab world.
I wish to give a hand ... and make the others life better by doing something I think that I know how to do it ( at least I think :)

Your Support is Required by Ideas, Direct cooperation, Testing, and encouragement ... I am on goining with this project wishing it will be something to rely on in judgement day :)

Also, I'll try to add a feature that you can send me what you have added to the database of the dictionary so you can contribute enhancing the content ...

it is "Trail" for now so please enjoy playing around, but do not put a lot of effort charging it with words, because more details are going to be added ...
summary: an English to Arabic text translator
